metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13453 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Zipios before 0.1.7 does not properly handle certain malformed zip archives and can go into an infinite loop, causing a denial of service. This is related to zipheadio.h:readUint32() and zipfile.cpp:Zipfile::Zipfile(). Mike Salvatore discovered that Zipios mishandled certain malformed ZIP files. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or consume system resources.

criterions.comment: zipios++: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
